body_html:
Thanks @kmalakoff, @andydavis1, @asimshankar and @suharshs.

I am also interested in this functionality for a TensorFlow creative coding wrapper I am writing for Cinder and OpenFrameworks. I'd be willing to contribute as well.

On a related note, I wonder if anyone can comment on whether there is planned support in the C/C++ API for graph collections (TRAINABLE_VARIABLES, LOCAL_VARIABLES, etc) as per this discussion.
body_text:
Thanks @kmalakoff, @andydavis1, @asimshankar and @suharshs.
I am also interested in this functionality for a TensorFlow creative coding wrapper I am writing for Cinder and OpenFrameworks. I'd be willing to contribute as well.
On a related note, I wonder if anyone can comment on whether there is planned support in the C/C++ API for graph collections (TRAINABLE_VARIABLES, LOCAL_VARIABLES, etc) as per this discussion.
body:
Thanks @kmalakoff, @andydavis1, @asimshankar and @suharshs.

I am also interested in this functionality for a TensorFlow creative coding wrapper I am writing for [Cinder](https://github.com/cinder/Cinder) and [OpenFrameworks](https://github.com/openframeworks/openFrameworks). I'd be willing to contribute as well.

On a related note, I wonder if anyone can comment on whether there is planned support in the C/C++ API for graph collections (TRAINABLE_VARIABLES, LOCAL_VARIABLES, etc) as per [this discussion](https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/discuss/V-pX3uDR2Xk).
